title: GENERAL
fullText:
Only testing equipment suitable for the tests being performed shall be used for testing. Testing equipment should be used in accordance with its operating instructions.
Testing equipment should be checked before each use so that â€”
(a) it is in working condition, clean, and has no cracked or broken components;
(b) the insulation on leads, probes and clips of test equipment are in working condition; and
(c) it operates correctly.
